sentences.english: Article 105 Women enjoy equal rights with men in civil law.
sentences.chinese: 第一百零五条妇女享有同男子平等的民事权利。

sentences.english: Article 105 Women shall enjoy equal civil rights with men.
sentences.chinese: 第一百零五条妇女享有同男子平等的民事权利。

sentences.english: They don't have to pass civil-rights bills for Africans.
sentences.chinese: 因为是非洲人，他们不能通过民事权利法案。

sentences.english: The fourth part focuses on the scope of supervision of provincial powers.
sentences.chinese: 肆为省政府的事权监督范围。

sentences.english: Self-help is the legal reinforcement to protect the civil right.
sentences.chinese: 自力救济是一种强化民事权利保护的法律制度。

sentences.english: The concept of civil right is the key concept of civil law discipline.
sentences.chinese: 民事权利是民法学的核心概念。

sentences.english: The capacity for civil liability has nothing to do with the capacity for civil conduct.
sentences.chinese: 一切自然人都具有民事权利能力和民事责任能力。

sentences.english: In our country, it is still a new-style civil right.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，他还是一种新型的民事权利。

sentences.english: Civil rights means you're asking Uncle Sam to treat you right.
sentences.chinese: 民事权利意味着你要向山姆大叔讨回你的公道。

sentences.english: Partners also have a say in the terms of the credit agreements.
sentences.chinese: 合伙伙伴对信用卡协议中的条款拥有话事权。

sentences.english: Water conservancy projects involve a variety of civil rights, in particular water rights.
sentences.chinese: 水工程涉及多种民事权利类型，水权只是其中一类。

sentences.english: Have the opposite and independent personnel power with the finance power.
sentences.chinese: 具有相对独立的人事权和财务权。

sentences.english: Civil rights keeps you in his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 民事权利使你藏于他的口袋中。

definition: property ownership or right/financial power/financial control
ability to make one's own decisions
"meals prepared at separate stoves", slogan of the program of fiscal decentralization that began in the 1980s in the PRC
